name: Satisfactory Dedicated Server
description: Dedicated Satisfactory server powered by wolveix/satisfactory-server.

agreement.title: Satisfactory EULA
agreement.text: You must accept the Satisfactory EULA before creating this server.

composeInline:
services:
  satisfactory:
    image: wolveix/satisfactory-server:latest
    container_name: vestri-{{SERVER_SLUG}}
    ports:
      - "7777:7777/tcp"
      - "7777:7777/udp"
      - "8888:8888/tcp"
    environment:
      STEAMBETA: "{{SERVER_SOFTWARE}}"
      MAXPLAYERS: "8"
      PGID: "1000"
      PUID: "1000"
    volumes:
      - ./data:/config
    stdin_open: true
    tty: true
    restart: unless-stopped
